skdetail:

Invocation Name: sloth facts
des: Sloth Facts are very entertaining because they're random facts about a wild animal you would think that does nothing all day. These facts will tell you otherwise. Sloth's are actually active in a different way than other wild animals. If you're a wild animal lover, learn about a new wild animal like the sloth.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
